name: r6calls
description: Rainbow Six Siege map calls quick references

scripts.build:css: npm run build:css:main && npm run build:css:about
scripts.build:js:main: npm run build:js:mkdir && uglifyjs --compress --mangle -o ./site/js/main.min.js --source-map  "filename='./site/js/main.min.js.map', url='main.min.js.map', includeSources=true" ./dev/js/main/main.map-data.js ./dev/js/main/main.map-render.js ./dev/js/main/main.controls.js ./dev/js/main/main.map-selection.js ./dev/js/main/main.drawing.js ./dev/js/main/main.js
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.buildAndDeploy: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run deploy
scripts.buildAll: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:svg
scripts.buildAllAndDeploy: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:svg && npm run deploy

author: DudeKiller
